p: DENV3-4 sequences in this study were also characterized by a discrete distribution along ML trees ( Fig 3). Meanwhile, most imported cases of DENV3-4 were from Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, India, the Philippines, Viet Nam, and Cambodia. Most isolates of DENV3-4 in the current study were closely related to those from Indonesia, Singapore, India, the Philippines, Thailand, and Cambodia ( Fig 3).
